risk_flags.message: Complex AD group hierarchies may cause unexpected permission inheritance and mapping challenges
Large employee base could create synchronization bottlenecks and potential latency in role assignment
Potential permission conflict risks when mapping between AD groups and Salesforce role structures
Lack of defined error handling strategy might lead to incomplete or inconsistent user provisioning
Unclear integration details may require additional discovery and architectural design work

suggestions: Define a detailed mapping matrix specifying exactly how each Active Directory group translates to specific Salesforce role permissions and access levels
Include explicit performance requirements, such as maximum processing time for role assignment and maximum concurrent user synchronization limits
Develop a comprehensive error handling strategy that captures and logs synchronization failures, with clear escalation paths for permission conflicts and unresolvable mapping scenarios
Design a mechanism to validate and audit role assignments, ensuring that the automated system can generate compliance reports showing precise permission mappings
Implement a phased rollout approach with initial pilot testing in a controlled environment to validate the synchronization logic and minimize potential security risks

risks.description: Complex AD group hierarchies may cause unexpected permission inheritance and mapping challenges
risks.mitigation: Develop a comprehensive mapping matrix with clear rules for role translation, implement validation checks to prevent unintended permission escalation

risks.description: Performance scalability risks with large employee base potentially causing synchronization bottlenecks
risks.mitigation: Design asynchronous processing, implement batch synchronization with configurable concurrency limits, add performance monitoring and throttling mechanisms

risks.description: Security configuration risks in mapping between AD groups and Salesforce role structures
risks.mitigation: Implement strict role mapping validation, create a comprehensive security audit trail, develop explicit permission conflict resolution protocols

risks.description: Unclear integration details and lack of detailed implementation specifications
risks.mitigation: Conduct thorough discovery workshop, create detailed technical specification document, define explicit integration interface and error handling protocols

warnings: Large employee range may complicate implementation
recommendations: Define detailed technical architecture for AD-Salesforce integration
Specify performance benchmarks and scalability requirements
Develop comprehensive error handling and logging strategy
Clarify security protocols for role assignment
Create a detailed implementation plan addressing temporary role management
Quantify expected performance metrics for 2400-3000 employee scale
